It doesn't really matter but `--no-deps` is no longer required:
```suggestion
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv"
```

OK. The docs still suggest it: https://conda-forge.org/docs/maintainer/adding_pkgs.html, and I've been burned before by leaving it out (https://github.com/conda-forge/conda-forge.github.io/issues/684), so I think I'll leave it in if the recipe is still acceptable.
